name: Spin Rush
description: Spin Rush is 2D arcade game, where you have to collect dots and match colors.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel dual core 2.0 Ghz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Nice and simple game. This game is good to increase your reflect and this game is so colorful

A puzzle game where you can level up! Neat-o!  While it's an unique and fun game, I do have a problem with it: the background makes you disoriented. The game is suppose to test your reflexes, and the background flashing all sorts of colors doesn't help with that. If you were able to turn off the background and just focus on the game then it would be a much better game.
